Parameters: IOException: error state, or null if closed cleanly. If the close event was the result of @B_android#os#ParcelFileDescriptor#detachFd_E@, this will be a @B_android#os#ParcelFileDescriptor#FileDescriptorDetachedException_E@. After detach the remote side may continue reading/writing to the underlying @B_java#io#FileDescriptor_E@, but they can no longer deliver reliable close/error events.
onClose(java.io.IOException).Description: Event indicating the ParcelFileDescriptor to which this listener was attached has been closed.

ClassDesc: Callback indicating that a ParcelFileDescriptor has been closed.
